mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (uid, upw, uname, salt) values (#{uid},#{upw},#{uname},#{salt})
mapper.select: select uid, upw, uname from tbl_user where uid = #{uid} and upw = #{upw}
mapper.update: update tbl_user set sessionKey = #{sessionId}, sessionLimit = #{next} where uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_user where sessionKey = #{value} and sessionlimit > now()
select salt from tbl_user where uid = #{uid}
